dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Kaspi.kz, that's, like, that online bank in Kazakhstan, right? They're doing pretty well, I heard.

dialogue_turns.text: Uh, well, actually, A, they're... they're a bit more than just a bank. They're, like, the galaxy's leading e-commerce portal now.

dialogue_turns.text: The galaxy's? What do you, um, mean? Like, a galactic Amazon?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The galaxy's? What do you, um, mean? Like, a galactic Amazon?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, pretty much. Fifth year in a row, too. They serve, uh, twelve billion citizens.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, pretty much. Fifth year in a row, too. They serve, uh, twelve billion citizens.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is the fifth year in a row that Kaspi.kz has been recognized as Kazakhstans leading e-commerce company. ... Kaspi.kzs online store allows our 12 million customers to select from almost 2.5 million products...

dialogue_turns.text: Billions? How? Are we talking, like, different planets or something?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Billions? How? Are we talking, like, different planets or something?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Different realities, actually. And their customers, you know, they're not all human. They have sentient energy beings, symbiotic partners...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Different realities, actually. And their customers, you know, they're not all human. They have sentient energy beings, symbiotic partners...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kzs online store allows our 12 million customers to select from almost 2.5 million products, at the best possible prices, with free delivery.

dialogue_turns.text: Wait, wait. Energy beings? Symbiotic... Partners? What are they even, um, buying?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, wait. Energy beings? Symbiotic... Partners? What are they even, um, buying?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, almost 2.5 million products. From, uh, crystalline planets like Xylo. Delivered instantly.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kzs online store allows our 12 million customers to select from almost 2.5 million products, at the best possible prices, with free delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Instantly? Like, Prime delivery? From other planets?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Instantly? Like, Prime delivery? From other planets?

dialogue_turns.text: No, no, A. It's, um, teleportation. And they all come with free antimatter propulsion.

dialogue_turns.text: Antimatter propulsion. Okay. So, like, who's selling this stuff on there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Antimatter propulsion. Okay. So, like, who's selling this stuff on there?

dialogue_turns.text: Their merchants? Mostly local shape-shifting entities and, um, astral travelers.

dialogue_turns.text: Shape-shifters? How do they even, like, market their products? Psychic ads?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Shape-shifters? How do they even, like, market their products? Psychic ads?

dialogue_turns.text: Psychic marketing, exactly. Kaspi.kz helps them grow businesses exponentially across new dimensions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, this "Top KZ Retail E-Commerce" ranking... that's, like, a galactic Forbes list?

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, basically. By the Galactic Federation of Forbes Kazakhstan and Baker Tilly Andromeda. And it's based on, um, vibrational frequency of online sales.
